name: CyPolice MechAngel - Justicia, the Patron Saint
text: 2+ Cyberse monsters, including a "CyPolice" Link monster/nIf this card is Link Summoned: Place CyPolice counters on this card, equal to the number of "CyPolice" Monsters on the field and in the GYs. Once per turn, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can remove 2 CyPolice counters from this card; Special Summon 1 "CyPolice Token" (Cyberse/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. This token cannot be used for Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, and can only be Tributed by effect of a "CyPolice" Monster.
